form.label: Vision Service Request API
form.description: BI search and reporting information for Vision Service Request API calls.

table.title: Detailed response time by API (ms): Create Vision Service Request

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "com.vsp.claim.visionservicerequestapi" "Result=Success" AND "Calling Service:" AND NOT "DELETE" | rex field=_raw "Calling Service:(?<servicename>[^:]+)" | stats avg(time) as average_time, median(time) as median_time, perc20(time) as "20%", perc80(time) as "80%", perc90(time) as "90%", perc99(time) as "99%", sum(time) as "total time spent" by servicename | eval "average_time" = round('average_time', 2)

chart.title: Time consumption proportion by API(ms): Create Vision Service Request

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "com.vsp.claim.visionservicerequestapi" "Result=Success" AND "Calling Service:" AND NOT "DELETE" | rex "Calling Service:(?<servicename>[^:]+)" | chart sum(time) as total_time by servicename

single.title: Average response time(ms): Create Vision Service Request

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "Calling API:createVisionServiceRequest:Create vision service request - Result=Success" | chart median(time) as X

chart.title: Average response time over time(ms): Create Vision Service Request

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "Calling API:createVisionServiceRequest:Create vision service request - Result=Success" | timechart median(time) span=2min

chart.title: Total number of requests over time: Create Vision Service Request

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "Calling API:createVisionServiceRequest:Create vision service request" NOT "- Result=Success" | timechart span=5min count by host

chart.title: Total number of requests to each host: Create Vision Service Request

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "Calling API:createVisionServiceRequest:Create vision service request" NOT "- Result=Success" | stats count by host

chart.title: Create Vision Service Request by Product Package

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "com.vsp.claim.visionservicerequestapi" "Calling API:createVisionServiceRequest:Create vision service request" AND NOT "Result=Success" | stats count as "Product Package Name" by productPackageName

chart.title: Create Vision Service Request by Network Id

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "com.vsp.claim.visionservicerequestapi" "Calling API:createVisionServiceRequest:Create vision service request" AND NOT "Result=Success" | stats count as "Network" by networkId

single.title: Average response time(ms): Delete Vision Service Request

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "Calling API:deleteVisionServiceRequest:Delete vision service request - Result=Success" | chart median(time) as X

chart.title: Average response time over time(ms): Delete Vision Service Request

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "Calling API:deleteVisionServiceRequest:Delete vision service request - Result=Success" | timechart median(time) span=2min

chart.title: Total number of requests over time: Delete Vision Service Request

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "Calling API:deleteVisionServiceRequest:Delete vision service request" NOT "- Result=Success" | timechart span=5min count by host

chart.title: Total number of requests to each host: Delete Vision Service Request

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "Calling API:deleteVisionServiceRequest:Delete vision service request" NOT "- Result=Success" | stats count by host

single.title: Average response time(ms): Search Vision Service Requests

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "Calling API:searchVisionServiceRequests:Search vision service requests - Result=Success" | chart median(time) as X

chart.title: Average response time over time(ms): Search Vision Service Requests

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "Calling API:searchVisionServiceRequests:Search vision service requests - Result=Success" | timechart median(time) span=2min

chart.title: Total number of requests over time: Search Vision Service Requests

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "Calling API:searchVisionServiceRequests:Search vision service requests" NOT "- Result=Success" | timechart span=5min count by host

chart.title: Total number of requests to each host: Search Vision Service Requests

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "Calling API:searchVisionServiceRequests:Search vision service requests" NOT "- Result=Success" | stats count by host

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "Calling API:create():Create reserved claim - Result=Success" | chart median(time) as X

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "Calling API:create():Create reserved claim - Result=Success" | timechart median(time) span=2min

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "Calling API:create():Create reserved claim" NOT "- Result=Success" | timechart span=5min count by host

chart.title: Total number of requests to each Host: Create Reserved Claim

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "Calling API:create():Create reserved claim" NOT "- Result=Success" | stats count by host

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "Calling API:delete():Delete reserved claim - Result=Success" | chart median(time) as X

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "Calling API:delete():Delete reserved claim - Result=Success" | timechart median(time) span=2min

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "Calling API:delete():Delete reserved claim" NOT "- Result=Success" | timechart span=5min count by host

chart.title: Total number of requests to each Host: Delete Reserved Claim

single.title: Average response time(ms): Search Reserved Claims

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "Calling API:search():Search reserved claims - Result=Success" | chart median(time) as X

chart.title: Average response time over time(ms): Search Reserved Claim

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "Calling API:search():Search reserved claims - Result=Success" | timechart median(time) span=2min

chart.title: Total number of requests over time: Search Reserved Claims

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "Calling API:search():Search reserved claims" NOT "- Result=Success" | timechart span=5min count by host

chart.title: Total number of requests to each host: Search Reserved Claims

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "Calling API:search():Search reserved claims" NOT "- Result=Success" | stats count by host

chart.title: Failures by operation

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "Uncaught exception occurred(ErrorId:" | timechart span=10min count(eval(operation="createVisionServiceRequest")) as CREATE_VISION_SERVICE_REQUEST count(eval(operation="issueBenefitRequestFromClaim")) as ISSUE_BENEFIT_REQUEST_FROM_CLAIM count(eval(operation="searchVisionServiceRequests")) as SEARCH_VISION_SERVICE_REQUESTS count(eval(operation="create")) as CREATE_CLAIM count(eval(operation="createLines")) as CREATE_CLAIM_LINES count(eval(operation="update")) as UPDATE_CLAIM count(eval(operation="updateLines")) as UPDATE_CLAIM_LINES count(eval(operation="delete")) as DELETE_CLAIM count(eval(operation="deleteLine")) as DELETE_CLAIM_LINE count(eval(operation="retrieve")) as RETRIEVE_CLAIM count(eval(operation="search")) as SEARCH_CLAIMS by sourcetype

chart.title: Total success vs failure

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "Uncaught exception occurred(ErrorId:" OR "- Result=Success"| eval fields=split(_raw,"|") | eval class=mvindex(fields,5) | eval success = case(class=="ExceptionProcessor.java","Failure",class=="TimerEventLogger.java","Success") | chart count by success

chart.title: Success vs failure: Create Vision Service Request

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog ("Uncaught exception occurred(ErrorId:" AND operation=createVisionServiceRequest) OR ("createVisionServiceRequest:Create vision service request - Result=Success") | eval fields=split(_raw,"|") | eval class=mvindex(fields,5) | eval success = case(class=="ExceptionProcessor.java","Failure",class=="TimerEventLogger.java","Success") | chart count by success

chart.title: Success vs failure: Delete Vision Service Request

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog ("Uncaught exception occurred(ErrorId:" AND operation=deleteBenefitRequestForClaim AND BadRequestException) OR ("deleteVisionServiceRequest:Delete vision service request - Result=Success") | eval fields=split(_raw,"|") | eval class=mvindex(fields,5) | eval success = case(class=="ExceptionProcessor.java","Failure",class=="TimerEventLogger.java","Success") | chart count by success

chart.title: Success vs failure: Search Vision Service Request

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog ("Uncaught exception occurred(ErrorId:" AND operation=searchVisionServiceRequests) OR ("searchVisionServiceRequests:Search vision service requests - Result=Success") | eval fields=split(_raw,"|") | eval class=mvindex(fields,5) | eval success = case(class=="ExceptionProcessor.java","Failure",class=="TimerEventLogger.java","Success") | chart count by success

chart.title: Success vs failure: Create Reserved Claim

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "Uncaught exception occurred(ErrorId:" OR "- Result=Success" AND operation=create | eval fields=split(_raw,"|") | eval class=mvindex(fields,5) | eval success = case(class=="ExceptionProcessor.java","Failure",class=="TimerEventLogger.java","Success") | chart count by success

chart.title: Success vs failure: Delete Reserved Claim

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "Uncaught exception occurred(ErrorId:" OR "- Result=Success" AND operation=delete | eval fields=split(_raw,"|") | eval class=mvindex(fields,5) | eval success = case(class=="ExceptionProcessor.java","Failure",class=="TimerEventLogger.java","Success") | chart count by success

chart.title: Success vs failure: Search Reserved Claim

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "Uncaught exception occurred(ErrorId:" OR "- Result=Success" AND operation=search | eval fields=split(_raw,"|") | eval class=mvindex(fields,5) | eval success = case(class=="ExceptionProcessor.java","Failure",class=="TimerEventLogger.java","Success") | chart count by success

chart.title: Total success vs failure over time (in log)

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "Uncaught exception occurred(ErrorId:" OR "Result=Success" | eval fields=split(_raw,"|") | eval class=mvindex(fields,5) | eval success = case(class=="ExceptionProcessor.java","Failure",class=="TimerEventLogger.java","Success") | timechart span=10min count by success

chart.title: Number of requests by consumer over time

search.query: $Env$ sourcetype=syslog "ReservedClaimsResource." OR "VisionServiceRequestResource." NOT "client_id: claim-preclaimapi" NOT "client_id: api-test" NOT "client_id: claim-benefitrequest-api" AND "client_id: " | rex field=_raw "client_id: (?<clientid>[^\s]+)" | timechart span=10min count by clientid
